title: Practical Language Proficiency Improvement Program Utilizing Fandom Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience with fandom culture
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, language proficiency development through fandom content analysis

learning_goals: Analysis of fandom community texts improves critical reading ability by 30%
Learners demonstrate intermediate-level creative writing skills through fanfiction creation
Achieved over 80% participation in discussions related to fandom through peer feedback
Conducted collaborative literacy practices on digital platforms at least twice

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
